website_summaries.verdict: This drain snake can be a little easier to pull out of a drain, but isn't as flexible as other brands.
pros: Each snake only has barbs toward the bottom, so they are a little easier to pull out of a drain
Can be rinsed off and reused multiple times
cons: These aren't as flexible as some other brands, which makes them more susceptible to breaking

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: These came to me in a plastic bag in which they were bent . The bend caused the tool to have a weak center so when I put it in the drain, HALF of the tool broke off and is now STUCK in my drain. So not cool.. I can't see it in there. How am I supposed to get it out without it costing me a ton
customer_reviews.author: S. Russo

customer_reviews.title: There needs to be a zero star option
customer_reviews.text: These should not be produced or sold. they are too flimsy to get down an ordinary drain, and as a result, have no useful purpose on earth. These are a waste of time to read, review, ship, or manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: Joe from Colorado

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: If you have a weak stomach, you may want to have someone else do this. I used the tool in all four sides of a sink drain where the drain plug is not removable and I nearly threw up. It pulled out so much disgusting hair and gunk. I followed it up with the Green Gobbler liquid and am currently waiting overnight before pouring boiling water down the drain. I haven’t ran water yet, but even without the liquid, the tool pulled out SO much gunk that water drainage MUST already be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Gets all the hair out!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this initially to clean my sink drain, but the clog was too far down. I used it in my bathroom sink and the results were nasty! Be careful when removing this from the drain because it will flick dirty drain water everywhere when you pull the bottom of it out of the drain. It did in amazing job grabbing the hair and cleaning the drain in one quick use!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: The negative reviews were right
customer_reviews.text: I should have heeded the warnings of other reviewers for this product, but considering how cheap this product was I took a gamble, sadly it didn’t pay off. The way it arrived packaged is where the problem stated. It arrives folded in half, both ends of stick held together by rubber bands, therefore completely compromising the structural integrity of the sticks. It’s easy to use and I’m sure would have worked if it wasn’t for the bend in the middles of the stick which snapped off, luckily it didn’t get stuck in the drain. I wish I would’ve taken pics but I just became frustrated and threw entire thing in the rubbish bin.
customer_reviews.author: MsMGR

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to snake hair and anything blocking inside my bathroom sink drain. As durable and easy to use this snake was, it did not work. I guess you get what you pay for. The jagged edges didn’t grab anything or pull much of anything out. Maybe it would work better if it had more edges to or something. I thought I was wrong about the clog, but I got a different snake and it pulled a ton of hair out. My sink has been like new since the second snake I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie S.

customer_reviews.title: THAT was in my drain?!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, inexpensive, and effective. My long hair keeps our drain clogged and I started getting worried that using Drano so often would ruin our pipes. Plus Drano just wasn't doing the job anymore. So I decided to give these a whirl. I was not disappointed! Grossed out, yes, but disappointed no. I can't remove the stopper from my shower drain so it was a little difficult to feed it down the pipe but once I got it past that it was smooth sailing. And man oh man the nastiness that it brought out! Hair, lint, and who knows what else. Gross. But strangely satisfying. And now the water drains great! I will definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works - but with a caution.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect, but this little gizmo worked great in my bathroom sink. I didn't want to have to take out the attached "stopper" and was able to work around the stopper removing all the nasty stuff that was slowing down the sink. One thing to note is that after you insert the tool and wiggle it around, don't pull it up too fast. If you do, you splatter a lot of nasty gunk all around you and the bathroom. Take your time and it's a great little tool.
customer_reviews.author: S. F.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing & Too Stiff
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointing, it Didn't do anything (and I can pull out chunks of hair by putting a chopstick down there, so I KNOW there's stuff in there)!!! Too bad, too... I was really looking forward to this product working as described so I could post a great review and picture :-( Also, the plastic it's made with is too thick and too wide.... it doesn't bend easily and when you try to bend it, it starts to break/snap!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Skip the draino, you need this!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I’m not sharing any pictures because of how embarrassing it was to see what this thing pulled out of my drains. I’m talking DISGUSTING. I shoved this thing in not knowing what to anticipate and got more than what I bargained for. We’ve been living in our current home for a year now and I wish I would’ve done this sooner. Every drain in my house is clean now and I don’t have to attempt to drown them in draino with no improvement. Totally worth the pack and I like that they’re disposable, my stomach couldn’t handle cleaning a re-usable one.
customer_reviews.author: Alexsis

customer_reviews.title: No more drano!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying this, and didn't think it would work, because i bought one in the past, and it didn't do anything. But this stick is absolutely amazing!! I kept buying plumbr and drano every other month, and nothing seemed to be working. I used this thing once, and it pulled out all the hair gunk and shampoo build up in one go! Wish I'd gotten a pic, but it was nasty! Now my tub runs smooth, no more clogs, and better for the environment. :) Some of the teeth get bent depending on the drain, but good thing you get 6.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy Jade

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the wooooorst issue with my bathroom sink for over a year now. It just slowly drained (like slower than you are imagining), and even draino didn't seem to help! I tried the Green Gobbler yesterday, and after getting some gunk out with the tool, I seem to have found a fix! fingers crossed that i've solved my issue!
customer_reviews.author: emmy

customer_reviews.title: Green Gobbler Hair Grabber!
customer_reviews.text: My bathtub had been draining very slowly, I used the liquid stuff in the past, but I wanted something that I could keep around and use again. I found this product on Amazon and decided to give it a try; I'm glad I did! These little gadgets work at removing hair and gunk in the drain! Be prepared to be grossed out at what they pull up from the drain- but I have no problem reusing them again and again. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Time Use for Clearing Up Clogged Drain
customer_reviews.text: After numerous attempts to unclog my shower drain which failed by the way.. I decided to purchase this little thing. Let’s just say it works.. Wow!! Talk about a clog.. see pics attached.. The only downfall on this product was, it’s only good for a one time usage.. After that it starts to appear like it’s breaking down..
customer_reviews.author: KickRocks84

customer_reviews.title: Good product for nasty job
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical and after reading a couple of reviews was also a bit leery. As soon as I got the package, I had to try it on our bathroom sink which was barely draining. Although sometimes it was a bit tricky getting the tool into the drain, once I got started, it started pulling out all the yucky stuff. Although it only comes out a little bit at a time, it DOES come out. It makes a mess that I kept stopping to put in the trash and clean off the tool. In less than 15 minutes, the drain was running like new. YAY!
customer_reviews.author: SAMP

customer_reviews.title: Works Embarrassingly Well!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint about these is that they're plastic, they came in a bundle with a few of them so they're easy to use and disposable, so if you're trying to watch your plastic waste, keep that in mind. Otherwise, they worked great! I noticed my shower drain started draining slower than usual and figured I'd give these a try - I couldn't believe how well it worked! I agree with pulling the drain snake slowly so gunk doesn't get thrown everywhere and found it easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I originally was looking at more expensive options but couldn't decide on which one to try. I ordered this after reading reviews and at this price thought why not try it. My husband saw the product and commented that it didn't look like the spines would be effective. However, on my first experimental try on the shower drain I was amazed at how much hair it pulled up. I used to do the diy vinegar and baking soda method, but I am sold on this. Cleaning is a little gross but doable for me - my husband, not so much (lol).
customer_reviews.author: Glendoragal

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective, easy to use, no chemicals required.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked very well. It took me a minute to figure out how to get my bathtub plug out, but after that it was easy peasy lemon squeezy. All I did was insert the plastic stick thing down in the drain, gave it a little razzle dazzle, and pulled out a disgustingly gooey clump of hair. I did that a couple times on each side and now my shower drains 100% better. I have tried two different types of drain clog remover to no avail. This took maybe 5 minutes, and no chemical smell afterwards. Oh heck yes!!
customer_reviews.author: Jane of all Trades

customer_reviews.title: Works well for easy clogs
customer_reviews.text: These do work. They’re just not as sturdy as the red orange ones you can buy at the 99 cent store. It took me about 4 tries to really get it deep enough in to get hair out of the tub drain. Then I got a little worried because like another reviewer posted one spot on the plastic started turning white as if it was going to break. It got enough hair out and I didn’t want to risk the thing breaking off down my drain. I’d recommend for easy maintenance jobs but not a terrible clog. You would need something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Babymac26

customer_reviews.title: You will wish you had bought a steel cabled auger with a cable lock feature.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money, when you can get a $24 dollar Husky auger that does something this piece of plastic cannot do, it allows you to lock its steel cable at the where it comes out of the housing, so you can push past a clog that is beyond the reach of the Gobbler. (Look at the picture, it can't go anywhere near where it needs to, its too short and you can't push with plastic like you can with steel)
customer_reviews.author: T. Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough.
customer_reviews.text: My husband tried this on our bathroom sink. They are just not long enough to get all the way down to the curved part of the pipe. If you have tiny pipes like they show in photo ( almost guarantee that you don’t!) then try them, otherwise not worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: TerriG

customer_reviews.title: poor
customer_reviews.text: may work okay in a sink drain with water stopper removed; but doesn't do much for a ceramic tile shower drain ( plastic pipe ). Barbs break off easily and leave hair in grate.
customer_reviews.author: dg

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Be prepared to pull out the clog!
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked like a charm! I am not gonna lie it was pretty gross but darn effective. My master bath tub was draining slowly and it obviously had a hair clog. I have previously used chemical clog removers with little to no real improvement. I saw these on amazon and since my goal was to remove the clog I thought why not? It did take about 4 tries to get the whole clog but what I got out looked like a big wet kitten. The tub drains again like normal and after a rinse and sanitize the gobbler is ready for next time.
customer_reviews.author: Korinne Beard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for quick hair removal in tub drain
customer_reviews.text: This morning I was cleaning my bath tub . After I rinsed the tub, the water was taking a long time to drain. The green gobbler hair removal tool works like a charm. I was really surprised how much hair was clogged my tib drain. Later on I will run water through the tub to see if the water will drain faster. I eill keep this tool in my bathroom for hair clog emergencies
customer_reviews.author: Legal Princess

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but not reusable
customer_reviews.text: We moved into our house 8 months ago and just recently the drain on my husbands side of the counter wouldn't drain. I didn't want to damage anything with corrosive chemicals so I thought this was worth a try since it was also a lot cheaper than chemicals. I stuck one of the plastic things down the drain 8-10 times and pulled out soo much hair. I had to pull it off between jabs. I don't think that one piece is reusable because many of the teeth broke during the process. I just threw it away but I'd say this product is an overall win. His drain works perfectly now.
customer_reviews.author: foroneaudience

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting but works
customer_reviews.text: Worth Every Penny! I've been using a natural drain cleaner and odor eliminator for weeks trying to clear a clog, and it wasn't working. I was avoiding Drano because once I left it too long and it etched my drain head. I used this according to the provided instructions and oh boy it brought every single clog up and out! The best part is if you feel like it's getting weaker, this set comes with so many that you can rest assured there are many others to try with. I tried it on my partners sink too and came up with a clog where he hasn't been having any drainage problems! This thing works so well.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I had two sinks that were very slow draining and was about to have to call plumber but I came across this item and decided to give it a try. AWESOME! Worked like a charm and I didn't have to take the sink apart! Sinks drain great and wife Loves me again! Seriously though, worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Can you use it on your sink?
customer_reviews.text: My husband pointed out that we cannot use it on our sink due to the way the stopper is hooked up. To use it we need to take of the u joint to undo the stopper. Of course when we get the u joint off we can clear the drain it easily. I had thought that your product would save us disconnecting the u joint. I am saving the product in case we can use it with other drains.
customer_reviews.author: KassieS

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: My parent’s guest bathtub has been draining water slowly for years and my parents thought that it was a plumbing issue and were putting off getting a plumber to come out. Well I decided one day after visiting to purchase this product and attempt an unclog. Once I received this product I crossed my fingers and went to work. It took me 5-10 minutes of aimlessly digging in the drain with the product to finally locate a wad of hair that was wedged so far deep in the drain. This product saved me a headache of cleaning the bathtub for almost 20 minutes after each shower.
customer_reviews.author: youngartist

customer_reviews.title: Horrified by what this fished out!
customer_reviews.text: Shower drain was moving really slow, and during regular times, we would have just called the plumber, but due to COVID, we decided to try and fix it ourselves. We tried dumping a bottle of drain cleaner down, but it didn’t really help. But you know what worked? These contraptions. This weird green plastic stick pulled a mass of stinky, matted, putrified hair out of the shower drain that could have passed for a coyote tail. Absolutely disgusting, but it took care of the issue. Not for the weak of heart or stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Halophonic

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Y’all I felt like a real life plumber using this! 😂 It worked so good! I was shock at all the hair and even a small bottle cap it brought to the surface. I kept having drainage issues and the liquid plumbing wasn’t working, so I turned to Amazon not even knowing such tool existed! I think I searched drain stick! lol. I know I saved myself some money with this. Comes with 5 “sticks”, can be cleaned and reused as well. Did my sink too since I was feeling handy.
customer_reviews.author: Shameka Haynesworth

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this I was worried that it would not work well. I used to have a long metal hook that I liked to use on my drain but I have lost it. And couldn't seem to find anything like that anymore so I ordered this. I have used it and am very pleased. I was worried that it would not be stiff enough but it does a great job of grabbing the hair and keeping hold of it as I pull it out of the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job cleaning hair out of the shower drain. If you care to clean it you may get a couple of uses out of it but no more. I purchased a bag of three first, my next order was for two bags. I have rental property and this has made the occasional slow shower and sink drain quick and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: John Keys

customer_reviews.title: On the one hand, it worked. Sort of.
customer_reviews.text: The first one, in the tub drain, needed a lit of action and then pulled out a lot of splattering black crud--a week after the big name foaming drain cleaner did nothing. BUT. The first one cracked in two, that almost left ten inches of plastic in the drain pipe. #2 finished the job, but I was much gentler on it. I don't think something that can break off so easily jn the drain is really safe, but it did clear out the crud, after #2.
customer_reviews.author: Some Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have been needing to get this type of item again for a long time. I have a lot of hair and the sink gets clogged easily where I get ready everyday. This comes with a decent sized pack for the money and works perfectly! I love that these are simple enough to not use chemical products that smell awful. Of course all this types of products are plastic so only complaint is i wish there was some made without plastic and something better for environment.
customer_reviews.author: TearLily

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use for my shower drain. I could not get them to work. I tried multiple times. I think the angle of the drain is just too sharp. The house was built in 1942 and the drain is kind of narrow. The snake gets hung and won’t go past about 6 inches. That’s where I guess the pipe turns. The material these are made of is too flimsy to try and force it. The snake just tries to bunch up in a zig zag pattern in the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: It Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: Great product. There is a reason it is the Amazon Choice! At my time of purchase it was the least expensive option and it worked wonderfully. They come in multi-packs so you can just dispose of the entire product (yes it will be disgusting) when you are finished. Sadly I bought a full "snake" only to find the problem was in the trap and not further down stream. Try this as your first option and it should do the trick 98% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Worked GREAT on my clogged bathroom sink!
customer_reviews.text: Would be hard to break one of these, as some reviews mention. You'd have to be really shoving it around trying to snap it. With just shoving it down as far as I could and twisting the top a few times (like a corkscrew) it brought up the clog, completely cleared in 2-3 times just for good measure. You don't really need 6 of them, but the spikes hold onto the gunk, so tearing it off is a little disgusting. Easier to trash it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Romero

customer_reviews.title: gross but effective
customer_reviews.text: The Green Gobbler cleans your drain of hair and gunk effectively. It is basically a one use product since its effectiveness is a result of a set of razor like teeth that grab onto the blockage and allows removal. Be prepared for a mess as you remove the Gobbler from the drain. If you have a drain cover over the shower it is difficult to insert and remove. Environmentally speaking it is better to use this when compared with a caustic drain cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: diane d'alba

customer_reviews.title: Green Gobbler for the WIN!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These little Green Gobblers sure get the job done! I admit, due to the price being significantly cheaper than most others on the market, I was skeptical of their effectiveness. I was pleasantly surprised when I was able to use the same tool to unclog both of my drains within minutes! With a package of 5 included, these will last quite a while. I unclog the hair from our drains every couple of months due to being a household of all long-haired females. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing at unclogging
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptical, like everyone else, but this unclogged 2 sinks. Pulled out all sorts of nasty stuff pretty quickly. One sink it wasn’t able to clear up but I’m assuming the plug is deeper down. I’d still buy these any day to help with clogs. Just not these are definitely single use. Once you pull up a clog, you can’t use it in another sink. The “hooks” get bent pulling up the clog. Great little product!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Feeling like a hero
customer_reviews.text: I used this on every sink in our house-- & it works. It's gross on so many levels but all my sinks definitely needed this they now go down as fast as water flows into them. So funny I had plumber come look at our sink in powder-- he had said ikea garbage and that was pretty much the way it was going to flow. One treatment with this thing & water flowed with ease. Can't believe I waited so long to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Aluckygirl

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly it works
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised that this device actually cleared a clog I had in my bathroom sink. I pulled up not a lot of hair from the drain but it moved around the stuff stuck in the drain enough to loosen it up and have it unclog. Each stick is good for only once unclogging because the little spike on the stick break off. But its so cheap who cares, thye give you 5 of them sojust throw it out and use a new one the next time you have a clog.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Gate

customer_reviews.title: Small but Strong
customer_reviews.text: So compact and easy to use. The tub has been leaving a little pool of water due to all the junk clogging it. Ordered one of these and stuck it down the drain. The results were so disgustingly satisfying. Took a picture but to spare you guys I won’t post it because I am embarrassed there was that much hair and lint down there. Affordable and not a gimmick! Works very well and now I’m set for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. It's cheap enough.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as intended. Used chemicals in the past for this bathroom tub. The last owners used it as their kid's bathroom. There were things down there that chemicals wouldn't burn through, which explained the backup. When I undid the cap and realized most of my gunk was right on top. Glad i decided to use the snake anyways for stuff I couldn't readily see till it got pulled out. I'm sure you can reuse it, but with a pack of 5 I chose to throw it out in fear it'd piece the gloves I was wearing, lol. Put a hair catcher over it and I'm hoping to never have to do that again.
customer_reviews.author: Rephew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was suspect of this because it didn’t seem very sturdy from the pictures. I am pleasantly surprised at the quality. I had an annoying dripping noise from inside the drain in my bathroom sink. Tried to clear it with baking soda and vinegar. This tool loosened up whatever was causing the dripping problem. I did not get much in the way of hair, etc pulled up with the tool, but my problem is solved. These can be reused.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Orr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I had been standing in almost ankle deep water in my shower/tub and had tried the chemical solutions and they did almost nothing. Even though I couldn’t get the stopper off of my drain I used this on the side of the drain. I used it twice and got hair out and the third time nothing came out. I have NO standing water in my tub and NO expensive bill from a plumber!!
customer_reviews.author: Priss

customer_reviews.title: Plumbers will hate this
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Saved my landlord a chunk of change for sure. We had a big clog in bathroom drain, kept getting worse. Did not want plumber coming in to apartment during quarantine. I looked at reviews and took a chance on this. It pulled out a bunch of gross hair, but two passes down and drain was clear! Wiped it off with a paper towel and put into trash. Done! Won’t need to call a plumber for this again!
customer_reviews.author: Iris Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Who Needs a Plumber?
customer_reviews.text: When my bathroom sink began draining really slowwwwwwly, I Googled "non-chemical drain cleaners." The Green Gobbler Hair Grabber caught my eye. Looked easy, effective, and cheap. And guess what? It IS easy, effective, and cheap. My drain is clear and I didn't have to call a plumber. Saved lots of $$$. Thank you thank you. I'm telling all my neighbors about EcoClean Solutions. I'll call the plumber for really bad problems.
customer_reviews.author: Carol N.

customer_reviews.title: Really helped when Drain-o didn't
customer_reviews.text: We used DrainoMax to try to unclog our sinks several times and we were still having issues. I decided to get these to remove what I was sure was clumps of my hair. I was able to get out a bunch of gunk that completely solved our plumbing issues. It did take a lot to get enough out to have the sinks working properly, but these did work and was better than me having to take off the elbow to get the clog out.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I had a plug in a hall shower that would barely allow the water to drain. I knew it must have been pretty bad. I did not want to use a liquid since there was too much blockage. The first time I put the stick into the drain, I got a small amount or hair. Then I extended it as far as it would go and felt it go through a large amount of hair. With a little jiggle I pulled out about 6-8" or a hair ball. The drain is now clear and running smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Baluch

customer_reviews.title: Nasty
customer_reviews.text: Yowza, the gunk and hair these Green Gobblin sticks pulled out of my sink -- I'm telling you. The pack arrived and the next day I went about casually poking one down my sink drain. It came up with gobs of hair and decaying hair hanging from it. In one fell swoop. Thank goodness these sticks are, for the most part, "one use". With what it pulls up from your drain, you'll be glad you can throw the whole hot mess away and pretend it never happened!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: The hook things broke off!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before buying this that were all over the place— half great and half terrible. I figured this would be similar quality to ones I had purchased at stores before, but no! The hooks break off in the drain!! Opposite of helpful!! This product is very poor quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: The handiest cleaning gadget ever!
customer_reviews.text: I watch Melissa Maker from Clean My Space on YouTube. Melissa recommended this product. I follow her religiously because she is an amazing cleaner, has a great sense of humor and honestly admits she doesn’t passionately love cleaning. Anyway I purchased this product and used it in my sink. It is easy to use and I was shocked by what came out of my sink! It was gross. This little green plastic easily fits in your sink and pulls out all sorts of things I didn’t know was in my sink. I highly recommend this product. I will spread the word to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: M Knickerbocker

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: These little green gobblers worked. The name speaks for itself. My tub was stopped due to me combing and washing hair and husband couldn't even take a shower without tub filling up with water. So he went ahead and ordered on Amazon it came and at first I was like is this going work. But as soon as I pushed all the way down in that drain and pulled out. Immediately my tub was working it grabbed all that nasty stuff.. I was very impressed .I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: SUPERMOM

customer_reviews.title: Works Like A Charm
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. On the first pass, it pulled up a disgusting fist-sized wad of soggy hair, and by the second pass, by sink was totally unclogged. Works like a charm and after a quick rinse and a run through the dishwasher, it can be used again. I seriously don’t know why I was living with a gross clogged sink for three weeks when fixing it was this easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on two drains
customer_reviews.text: Tools were received in good condition. Using the same tool, I successfully cleaned out two bathroom sink drains with no problems. ( I did remove the drain plugs from each sink prior to cleaning). No teeth broke off and I see no reason the same tool again. Both drains are flowing smoothly again. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective
customer_reviews.text: I was planning to use drano for a slowly draining bathroom sink. Was told that stuff is terrible so I went with this. Super easy to use and I was shocked how much hair it fished out of my drain. Only issue I had was the packaging kind of sucks. Came wrapped in rubber bands and the sharp plastic teeth can nick you if you’re not careful. Also some of the plastic teeth broke off in the drain during use, didn’t seem to cause any issue with the drain and I’m not planning to reuse the thing, but something to mention.
customer_reviews.author: Haruki Sato

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that worked
customer_reviews.text: My plumbing knowledge starts and ends with Drano. After months, and 3 bottles, I learned through internet searches that I needed to snake the drains of my slow-moving tub and sink. I wasn't prepared for how gross it would be, but after a few minutes of snaking each drain, hair/gunk/etc emerged with this contraption. For the first time in months, water is draining normally in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fair

customer_reviews.title: Only hair removal tool I need
customer_reviews.text: This works so much better than the hair removal tool you get with Drano. I tried the one Drano sends in their package, and after a long time, it still didn't remove anywhere near the amount I needed. The clog continued. This one, however, did the trick! Honestly, I'm thrilled with it. It can get so much deeper in the drain and the way it's designed helps get so much hair. My tub can breathe a sigh of relief. Or, rather, I can.
customer_reviews.author: Alper

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly gross
customer_reviews.text: Using this tool was the best and WORST 10 minutes of my life. Removing that much hair from my shower drain was a revelation. But seeing how much hair was in my shower drain will haunt me for many months. Seriously so easy to use and worked like a disgusting dream. The hair ball that came out of the pipes was revolting but so satisfying. I can't wait to take a shower knowing that all of the water will go down the drain quickly as it is supposed to. Highly recommend this product but not for the faint of heart. You might puke but it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Too Short, Too Flimsy – Is going to cost me more money than I spent
customer_reviews.text: I used these drain snakes to try to unclog my bathroom sink. They were too short to reach the bulk of the clog and the little spikes didn't seem to grab anything at all. I had much better luck using a wire hanger. After trying one on my bathroom sink drain, I tried to use one on my shower drain. Big mistake! It snapped off in my drain and I can't get it out, even with my longest needle-nose pliers. I will probably have to get a professional in to remove it because it's not budging for me. My cheap DIY solution has turned into a huge, pricey headache.
customer_reviews.author: Craneberry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, fast, amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been struggling with a clogged drain for about two months and while I’m a pro at using a coat hanger to get out the inevitable hair clogs, that hasn’t been doing the trick. We wanted to avoid using draino for multiple reasons, and decided to give these a try. It was so easy! Only took a few minutes and I got so much out. 🤢 It’s worth so much more than $6 - can’t recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: hayls

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great!! My bathroom sink was clogged. I tried the extra strength drain cleaner and it didn’t work! I bought these and was skeptical when I took them out of the package. But to my surprise, it cleared the clog!!! They are reusable and there are several that were included, so hopefully I won’t need to reorder. But, I would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: So disgusting, but so efficient!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great! Had a pretty badly clogged sink. Dran-O was not doing the trick. Read the good reviews on this, so I figured it was worth a shot for the price. Only took about 5 minutes of snaking this down the drain, and I was pulling up all sorts of hair and gunk that had probably been there from before I even bought the place. Gross. But it's totally clear now!
customer_reviews.author: Rishi Mehta

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but this was great. My bathroom sink was completely clogged. It has a center stopper which cannot be removed (which I hate and do not understand). I took one of these tools and pushed it in the small opening and pulled it out a couple of times. It pulled out the hair clogging the drain. Within 5 minutes I was done and the clog completely gone. I threw it out and no clean up. Excellent tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but get the job done!
customer_reviews.text: These worked really well, however I'm glad the set came with multiple because a couple of them the little hair grabbers broke off. Unclogged our drains quickly. The complaint I have is that they're somewhat difficult to dispose of; you certainly can't/don't want to get the hair off and they don't fold up easily (which I guess is a good thing).
customer_reviews.author: mamafrakes

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than a plumber and his butt crack!!
customer_reviews.text: For such a non intricate device it worked wonders! I knew I had some hair clogging our drains, but in my mind I was convinced one of my kids threw something down the drains to clog it. I literally stuck this green stick down there and pulled out a wad of hair as long as a cats tail 🤮🤮🤮. It was super gross yet intriguing at the same time lol. This will forever be a product in my house. Saved me tons of money, time, and I no longer have that yuckie feeling of standing in shower water!
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi Flyy

customer_reviews.title: This really works!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, it took longer to open the package from Amazon than it did to use one of these tools to remove a disgusting amount of hair from my bathroom sink drain. I'd already tried using a plunger and a chemical drain cleaner specifically for hair clogs, but the problem persisted. The Green Gobbler Hair Grabber Drain Tool was by far the most effective solution for my slow to drain bathroom sink with no chemical fumes, very little effort on my part, and no concerns about damaging my drain pipes or septic system. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. M.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the clog out at least
customer_reviews.text: Bought these specifically because they said reusable. I don't mind getting my hands dirty to disinfect them so I don't have to keep buying more.. but with the first use multiple of the ridges broke off into the drain. Hopefully that won't cause any damage to my system. But with 2 of the 5 snakes, I got big clumps of hairs out of my bathroom sink and tub.. including hair from the previous home owner. Much easier and more hair removed than the coat hanger.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy for clearing clogged drains
customer_reviews.text: These worked awesome! My shower drain was clogged. I ordered these and received them in 2 days. The directions were clearly printed on the bag but it was also pretty straightforward. I followed the directions and easily cleared the clog in minutes. Highly recommend to anyone with a similar issue!
customer_reviews.author: C. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Worked well....
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for me... I had a huge clog in my sbower drain and these cleared it. I did use two, but only because the clog was HUGE! Lots of nasty hair globs (so gross). Nonetheless my clog is clear now. So easy to use and did not break. Saved lots of money by not having to call a plumber. (Single woman here & I did it myself, no help required).
customer_reviews.author: Lawanda B.

customer_reviews.title: For Mild Hair Drainage / Blockage
customer_reviews.text: Water hasn’t been draining quickly enough and we’ve been using a hair net catcher for years, but we’ve never had a plumber come in ... We did get quite some hair out but our drain got MORE clogged! I think because there was so much stuck inside that even this couldn’t reach, and that this ended up pulling out unreachable hair to clog the pipes more. We ended up calling a plumber. :( This is a good tool for maintenance though!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.text: I've used quite a few of these and the orange ones I usually get are very flexible and handle a lot of stress and spring back to shape. With these I was worried it was going to break off in the drain. When these bend the plastic almost sheers and one of them almost broke completely. Be careful not to jam them in hard enough to bend them.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I hate using these but I love it too.
customer_reviews.text: Me, every day: “brushing my hair means there’s less that’ll go in the drain”! Three months later, my drain is BEGGING for this tool or something similar. There’s only one thing special about this one- it’s green. By the end of the day it’ll be covered in hair and sludge and you won’t want anything to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brb

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: This product works as expected but not reusable. The spikes breaks easily and looks like lot of waste from environment perspective for one time use. I tried cutting straws hack from youtube and it works as good as these for small sinks but for bathtubs it is not working as good as these. Overall works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: giskindra

customer_reviews.title: Works the Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the only way to get rid of hair clogs. This brand is better than the ones with spikes all the way down the sides. Those get caught in the drain & spit gunk up when pulled. Since these have spikes just at the end, they get the hair and the rest of the wand pulls up easier. If stuck, just wiggle sideways.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: I’m betting this is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used this product yet but I expect to be pleased. Purchased on the rave recommendation of a friend who has three teenage daughters, all with long hair, I’m confident I will be glad to have this in my arsenal of things to try so the plumber doesn’t have to be called to pull hair out of the drain pipes.
customer_reviews.author: Doodlebugs

customer_reviews.title: Worked Fantasticly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after buying the $50 drain powder along with a ton of baking soda and vinegar that did nothing! I should have just bought these inexpensive solutions. They get the hair out and your drain is no longer clogged. I would wear gloves as it's not pretty but it really works! I then put drain covers over the drains to avoid this problem in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Fray

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Green Gobbler this afternoon. Within 20 minutes of receiving this product, the eternal sink clog was cleared. The crazy part was, the gobbler got stuck. Uh oh! But with a few twists and tugs, the gobbler pulled out a large Bobbie pin! I never used bobbie pins. It must have been in there for years. I used a second gobbler to clear hair clogs. The drain is better than ever.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline peth

customer_reviews.title: I did not expect it to work SO well!!
customer_reviews.text: This drain cleaning tool worked even better than I had hoped. It was easy to use and very durable. Though we had a TON of hair pulled out of the drain, I was never worried the took would break. We were able to clean the drain completely, using multiple passes. The price point allowed us to simply toss the used grabber once we were done. We were thankful that we could so easily clean our drain before it became a bigger problem!
customer_reviews.author: Marie M

customer_reviews.title: This Little Gizmo Is Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t too sure this would work....the price seemed too good to be true....plus, it’s very simple. I was pleasantly surprised to discover it works exactly as described! I pulled so much hair and gunk from my bathroom sink that it was embarrassing. I was prepared to use drain opener afterwards, but it wasn’t even necessary! This is an AMAZING little gadget...absolutely brilliant!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: Get's the job done
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly long, curly, thick hair so cleaning out drains is something I'm accustomed to. I've used other brand drain tools before that haven't been up to snuff. This product worked amazingly well. I will spare you photos of my hair and gunk that was pulled out of the shower drain. You will have to take my word that it got the job done easily and efficiently. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DaraLynn

customer_reviews.title: Does what it say!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat this for the price. If you’re a woman, have thick hair, and have had children, you know how bad post partum hair loss is. Well it’s bad for the shower drain, not really for us! We taped two of these bad boys together so it reached the bottom of our pipes and it worked like a charm- even brought back a few bobby-pins I didn’t know about!
customer_reviews.author: A.L.T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive little item saved me from calling a plumber. I can't believe the junk it dislodged. Ugh! (One word of caution. I suspect the people who left bad reviews about this did not remove their drain stops before inserting it. Bad idea. I did it the right way the second time!) Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John61

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and effective
customer_reviews.text: The product comes bent in a U shape instead of being straight in the package like I expected. I’m not sure if the bend inhibited its ability to go down the drain. This product does its job well. I almost bent/broke the plastic toward the end of my cleaning session but was able to get the job done using only one stick. I didn’t have trouble getting it down the drain and didn’t have to remove the stopper. This room was inexpensive but very effective. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Dansie

customer_reviews.title: It's worth every penny you pay for it.
customer_reviews.text: This product really, really works! My only negative review about it is that it gets caught in the sink and starts bending and be comes floppy. I had to use 2 for the same job. The concept of the product is great. It took me about 5 mins to clear the problem. I did not have to use anything else, other than the productive, to clear the clog I had. I would definitely recommend this product, to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: MehMeh!

customer_reviews.title: Worked so well!
customer_reviews.text: I used this in the main bathroom shower, it was starting to drain a bit slow. I couldn't believe the amount of hair and junk it pulled up! So gross to deal with - thankfully I've used this type of product before and had plenty of paper towel ready- but just using this made the drain work perfectly again.
customer_reviews.author: RD&ND

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has reasonably long hair and it perpetually clogs the shower drain. The Green Gobbler successfully extracted several globs of hair. After using it, I also used baking soda and vinegar and a potful of boiling water to flush the pipes. My daughter says the drain works better now than it had in a long time! I like that the package comes with 5 Gobblers. I did rinse mine so it can be reused, but I have extras so I can send one with my daughter when she goes to college.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Brown

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use and long enough to grab the clog in my shower drain. I prefer to use this over draino or other chemicals that you would have to pour down the drain. It’s really gross what comes out of the drain but it takes 5 seconds and my shower water runs freely down the drain again.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: I have found the answer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair on consistently fight with clogged drains. I have gone through gallons of liquid plumber, trying to get rid of the clog. I decided to give this a try and am so glad I did. I was pretty disgusted with what came out of my drain, but my shower is draining perfectly now and I will never be without one of these handy little devices!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Only one which worked !!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a useful product, simple design and made to do its job in best way. I have tried all drano and other strong liquids to clear drainage, nothing worked. I kept buying more bottles and draining them down. This product is magical and removed all the gunk in one go !! Impressive ..
customer_reviews.author: Jags

customer_reviews.title: Perfect environmentally friendly drain cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I was a bit sceptical I will not lie. I needed to clear a bathroom drain. I had tried several bottles of drain cleaner with little luck. I followed the instructions and eureka...clear drain! So easy to use! The hair and stuff came up with ease. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Denver gal

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to its name!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. My bathroom sink was clogged with human and pet hair to the extent that it would not drain. The Green Gobbler worked like a charm and is simple to use. By inserting it into the drain and slowly withdrawing it, a monstrous amount of hair and crud was pulled out of the sink drain in just minutes. Very worth the money and I will definitely reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Try this before calling a plumber
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my plugged bath tub and it did remove all the hair that was clogging the pipe. Took me about 5-10 minutes and used 2pcs for this quick job. Hooks do break so it is not reusable. Don’t expect it to last for multiple use. I am giving it a 5 star for saving lots of money not having have to call a plumber.
customer_reviews.author: Keiji Osada

customer_reviews.title: By golly they work
customer_reviews.text: My tub drain was at a stand still. I thought I'd try these not holding out much hope as I didn't know how deep the clog would be. I have one of those screw top toppers and I didn't even have to rwmove it. I used 1 and put down there and on first attempt brought up a bunch of gunk and hair and down my water went. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works! Eco Friendly
customer_reviews.text: As advertised I was able to clear all four sinks in under 10 minutes. Grossed out by the yuk factor, but it was better to address it in this environmentally friendly way. My wife likes the Drano route, but it never seems to really clear it up. Now I have a new trick that is eco friendly and economical.
customer_reviews.author: Buksh Prime

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have these on standby
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pack and after using them bought another pack right away. I can't believe how long I dealt with some clogged bathtub and sink drains thinking it was going to be an hours long painful fix to do it right. No more. 5 minutes and the work is done. I used Drano after but it’s really not necessary. Like some of the other reviews mention, get ready for nasty.
customer_reviews.author: A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! - Green Gobbler Hair Grabber Tool Drain Snake Hair Clog Remover
customer_reviews.text: This drain tool is amazingly simple and efficient! I have very long and thick hair, and this lovely tool makes it easy to remove the hair before it clogs my drain. I'm grateful that I found this amazing tool!
customer_reviews.author: jdeane33

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this, honestly I did not think the item would work as I used other drain cleaners and had no luck with those. However this had really good reviews and now I see why. First drain cleaner out of the 3 or 4 different ones I've tried that actually helped remove the clog I had and now my sink drains normally again!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lucarelli

product_meta.title: Green Gobbler Hair Grabber Drain Tool | Hair Clog Remover | Drain Opener for Sinks, Tubs & Showers - Pack of 5
product_meta.description:
Hair clogging up your drain? Green Gobbler’s Hair Grabber Drain Tool is the fastest and easiest way to clear slow, clogged drains. This durable 22” plastic tool is suitable for use in all residential drains, including sinks, bathtubs, and showers! Don’t waste money on a plumber who will remove the hair out for you when you can simply and easily do it yourself with this safe, reusable, and economical alternative!



Directions: Simply lower the hair grabber tool into any drain that is clogged or slow-running. Once the tool is as far into the drain as possible, slowly pull it back, allowing it to grab all the hair that is blocking the line. Remove the hair & repeat the process as needed. Can be rinsed off and used multiple times.
feature_bullets: WORKS LIKE A CHARM - Green Gobbler’s Hair Grabber tool is the most effortless and reliable solution for easily removing hair and other blockages.
SAVE MONEY ON A PLUMBER - Don’t waste hundreds of dollars for a plumber to remove the hair clogging your drain. Save money by doing it yourself with this extra-long 22” hair grabber!
REUSABLE - This hair grabbing tool is made of sturdy plastic material that can easily be rinsed off and re-used multiple times.
USE IN ANY DRAIN - This tool is safe and compatible with all household drains, including: sinks, bathtubs, and showers!
SAFE FOR PLUMBING - Hair Grabber Tool clears drains of hair quickly and effectively, all while being safe for your plumbing system.
